analysis.key_quote: Removing experienced, dedicated public servants from their positions and replacing them with people whose only qualification is fealty to the person in the White House will have the opposite effect to improving performance, accountability, and responsiveness in civil service.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about replacing experienced public servants with politically loyal individuals, which undermines the merit-based system and suggests a risk of politicization in civil service.
